remarks: Less-than property of a lattice automorphism.  (Contributed by NM, 20-May-2012.)
statement:
lautlt.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
lautlt.s $e |- .< = ( lt ` K ) $.
lautlt.i $e |- I = ( LAut ` K ) $.
lautlt $p |- ( ( K e. A /\ ( F e. I /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) ) -> ( X .< Y <-> ( F ` X ) .< ( F ` Y ) ) ) $.
